activities.name: Copy From Core to Master Data

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select
	S.CustomerNumber, S.DistributionCenterFlag, S.WholeSalerPlatinum, S.MITPaket, S.PromoPaket, S.NPDPaket, S.DMSReserve1
From
[CustomerAdditionals] S

SELECT 
'ND' as UPDATE_STATUS,
Substring(Mainkey, 1, 6) as MAINKEY,
Substring(Subkey, 1, 7) as SUBKEY,
Substring([Data], 1, 80) as DATAFIELD
From [Configuration]
where [Mainkey] = 'SendToBI'
And substring ([param], 1, 1) = '1'
And [Application]='BACKEND'
